title: Measuresoft ScadaPro Client Link Following Denial-of-Service Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to create a denial-of-service condition on affected installations of Measuresoft ScadaPro Client. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the ScadaPro Client installer. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker can abuse the installer to create a file. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to create a denial-of-service condition on the system.
addtionnal_details: Measuresoft has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.cisa.gov/uscert/ics/advisories/icsa-22-235-06
timeline:
2022-02-01 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2022-08-23 - Coordinated public release of advisory
